title: 刚才OP用gamerule mobGriefing 改不回来了
author: qq908155281
txt_content: 爬行者 gamerule mobGriefing ture 也不好使 苦力怕还是炸不了方块

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
打gamerule mobGriefing true

顺便说下
true = 开启
false = 关闭

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
编辑server.pro
 使enable-snooper=true
 保存文件并重启服务端
